mercury.description: The world's first domed shaped 7-dimesional movie theatre. Space Dome is the best location to have fun with friends and family by watching a space movie which looks completely like reality.

venus.description: Historical Art is a history museum which contains all the history about the solar system ranging from its formation to the present date. Every space related historical artifact can be found here. Entry to this museum is completely free.
venus.all_attractions: Historical Art, Maxwell (Mountain Region), Lava Plains

mars.description: Other World is a place made with new tech where you can have virtual experience of other planets and other galaxies.
mars.all_attractions: Other Worlds, Canyon, Dry Lake Bed

jupiter.description: Space-O-World, world's first floating in-air space theme park. It includes many different space theme rides along with the world's largest roller coaster. It is the best theme park for space lovers. Free entry of Space-O-World is included with this tour.

saturn.description: The world's first floating shopping centre in the shape of a eclipse. This amazing shopping centre is built along with the saturn's rings which makes it the most beautiful public attraction in the complete solar system. Hotel Stay and food is available for free with this tour.

uranus.description: The Tech City is as large as a city completely made of technology. You can find every piece of technology from the past, present and future tech prototypes here. This makes it the best attraction place for tech lovers. All the costs of visiting Tech City is included in this tour's price.
uranus.all_attractions: The Tech City, The Tech Museum

neptune.description: Ice Park is the world's largest ice theme park. You can find every ice related game and ride here. Its the best place to hangout for a nice icey experience. The costs of hotel stay and food is included in the tour's price.
neptune.all_attractions: The Ice Park, The Ice Theme
